long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Offline Games To Play - Chrome Extension
Bored and stuck without an internet connection? Offline Games To Play is the perfect Chrome Extension to keep you entertained and engaged!

With a collection of 23 mini-games, this extension provides a great way to relax, train your memory, and challenge your friends. From free brain teasers to test your IQ, to fascinating questions covering a wide range of topics, there's something for every mood and interest.

 ✔ Play any Tab, any where. 😉
✔ Offline Games, no ads! ❤️
✔ Free brain teasers to test your IQ and general knowledge 🧠
✔ No more boring times at school 😉

Download Offline Games To Play and never let a spotty internet connection ruin your day again!
